name: react-resize-aware
description: A React hook that makes it possible to listen to element resize events.
author: Federico Zivolo <federico.zivolo@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: microbundle --name useResizeAware --jsx jsx --jsxImportSource react --globals react/jsx-runtime=jsx && cp -f dist/index.umd.js docs/react-resize-aware.js && flow-copy-source src dist && cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
